sub_title: Supply chain optimization and inventory specialist
summary:
Supply chain and logistics professional passed from different managerial roles, gaining multiplex knowledge about retail and supply chain management, supporting private and public sector organizations.
Having graduate with 2:2 Honours Bachelor Degree in Managerial Decision Making and IT Support and  with Merit Master Degree in International Supply Chain and Logistic Management, completing with a leading project about Public Health Procurement which used successful at real hospital, making me able to use Big Data management, database systems, IT support languages (HTML, Pascal, C, PHP), Simulation systems (Simul8, extend, Flexsim etc.) , ERP and MRP systems, decision applications (Decision Tree), process and value stream map optimization and advance mathematics and statistics to support  my managerial decision at supply chain and help to improve it as also to implement innovation. I am proud that I had successfully passed from all my previous roles and I have gained the recognition of my employers, colleagues, and teacher that are willing to provide me with the best recommendations

projects.title: National Greek Health Care Procurement
projects.description: The Dissertation Thesis has as aim to depict the existing procurement process map, value stream map of the National Greek Health Care supply chain, compare it with other NHS supply chain of European counties and suggest solutions to can operate in lower cost without drop down the level of service to the patient. Also, in the process I make use of Tree choice applications and simulation applications to be able to visualize and check if the new process is the best possible and if surpass the bottlenecks and problems the old one had and if we made the best possible choices

contributors.headline: Supply chain optimization and inventory specialist

projects.title: Hospital Operations Re-engineering
projects.description: This project has as the main object to minimize the cost of the hospital without drop down the quantity and quality of the serves at society. Making use of simulation applications to simulate all the organization of the Hospital includes clinic and external Health centres and the use of Big Data managing base for information of the hospital for the patients and tests that made the last 10 years, I was able to define solutions to be able to operate at the same or even better quality and minimize the cost of the personnel and the operation.

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the launching of new business and projects for the clients of WebMyWorld or transformation of existing companies with an innovative solution to be able to cope with the new competitive age in the Market and reach their productivity target. Moreover, set up and integration of ERP, MRB systems. Creation of business planning, reorganization of operation process based on process mapping and value stream mapping, analysis of market opportunities and competition. Reorganization of the layout of business and warehouses to optimize the process and minimize the cost
profile_positions.title: Business Process Management Consultant

profile_positions.description: As the Head of  Supply Chain manages all aspects of the organization's supply chain management and operations, including procurement, vendor relations, production, logistics, and distribution. Develops and implements plans for managing supply chain processes for production and operations. Oversees demand forecasting, supply planning, and procurement to ensure resource requirements are satisfied. Communicates with executives regarding business needs to secure resources needed to satisfy customer demands and ensure delivery and/or implementation.
profile_positions.title: Head of SCM

profile_positions.description:
For the cosmetic paramedical Department : Responsible for the day to day order of the needs of the company using forecasting technics. Moreover, fulfil tasks of demand and inventory manager for the products of my suppliers, such as Loreal Estee Lauder Apivita Pierre Fabre Caudalie etc, providing all the needed  checks  adjustments  at  stock  and  creating  all  the  reports  for  them  in the company
For the Medical device Drug Department : Moreover, the one that searches for new business cooperation with supplier around the world. And prepare the new deals and orders from the start point to endpoint including negotiation with the supplier, booking of air or sea transportation and clearance of customs until the products are in our warehouse and ready for sale.
profile_positions.title: Buyer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the inventory balance, contact of contractors, vendors and suppliers, manage and implicate innovative improvements, analyze and report the forecast to the site manager. Manage house 3 different companies inventory with more than 2500 individual barcodes. Working with SAP and the company's ERP system. Avaya one of the leading companies in the sector of global internal communication providers and company solution providers.
profile_positions.title: Inventory Supervisor

profile_positions.location: Birch Coppice Business Park, Danny Morson Way, Dordon, North Warwickshire
profile_positions.description:
Working in a fast moving challenging working environment where receiving over  1.7 million items per day and responsible for 19 bays for the trucks (10 chill and 9 ambient). As Inbound Support Team Member my purpose is to be the primary control point for the Inbound supplier activities within the CFC and to provide support to the Inbound Operations Team. Moreover, to ensure accurate and timely management of suppliers, appointment and non-conforming stock enabling the smooth flow of product from the back door to its final location.
Key Responsibilities: 
1. Appointment and Purchase Order Management 
   a) Timely and accurate Appointment and Purchase Order management
   b) Responsibility for capturing accurate booking in and appointment closures times 
   c) Ensuring purchase orders are attached to the correct appointments
   d) Reopening of appointment to allow correct receipt of product
   e) Closure of purchase orders in line with appointments to allow accurate Purchase Order generation
   f)  Control and Authorisation of Blind Receipts
   g) Amend any purchase order quantities in line with any supplier shortage notifications out of hours
2)Non-conforming Management of Receipt Checks and Open Task Log 
3)Supplier Conformance
   a) Accurate capturing of performance-related information of a supplier 
   b) Supplier On Time - accurate arrival time -failed delivery
   c) Supplier In Full - accurate measurement of Purchase Order fulfillment
   d) Short life - accurate measurement of short life product delivered
   e) Chase late suppliers- provide 24/7 cover to chase supplier not arrived
   f) Accurate paperwork - ensure that standards are enforced
   g) Load presentation
4)Priority Receiving - Co-ordinate with the Operationsteamforintime receiving of priority stock
5)Returns to Supplier
6)Company Shop accurate stock logged
7)Supplier Consolidation
8)Supplier Rejection
9)Continual Process Improvement
10)Co-ordinate with the Operation Team for the reaching the targets
profile_positions.title: Inbound Office Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible for the procurement office of the hospital include 5 more people that report to me. I was responsible
for all the procurements of the hospital exclude the drugs, managing an annual budget of around 8 million Euro. I
operate national and international competitions for the procurement of hospital and I sign new contracts with
companies or I manage the existing contracts and communicate with the companies about details of the contracts. Also,
I was responsible for the management of the main warehouse of the hospital, the distribution of the products to the
different clinic or external health centers of the hospital based on their need, managing of the safety stock of the
hospital. Moreover managing of the existing contracts of the hospital with the suppliers and the way these contracts will
be performed at what period and at which amount it will be the orders to be able the hospital to keep safety stock and
keep us possible low stock at the main warehouse. Finally, I was responsible to report to the council of the hospital and
the Health District for all annual procurement and illustrate the details of them (their cost, reason of need, details of the
competitions that exist and of them that will operate at future, details of the inventory).
profile_positions.title: Procurement Manager

profile_positions.description: I server like private at the special armed force of the Greek Army at the borders of Greece with Bulgaria and Turkey. I take full military training and because of my organization skill and knowledge, I was also responsible for supporting the offices of Center of Command at the camp.  Due to my exceptional services i retired from the military with the rank of corporal.
profile_positions.title: Corporal

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible to update the web page of the real estate office with the new properties, check the market for the
update at prices of properties and the last movements of the rival real estate offices in the area. Also, I was responsible
for advertising the properties of the office and the office at the web. Moreover, I managed my own portfolios of
properties and I had my own clients.
profile_positions.title: Real Estate Manager

profile_positions.description:
I manage like the responsible manager for this project a small flexible team from IT and economic department of the
General Hospital of Arta. The aim of the project it was to set up and inform with the data of previous years the new
platform that the Hospital buy to move from the document management to the new area of e-management. This
includes input to the platform a database with big data that we set up manually for all economical documents for the
hospital the last 20 years, set up the application with all the needed standards that the European Union asked. Also, the
platform to be able to send information in live time at Health Ministry for all the economic department and to be able to
operate e-competitions with companies for the procurement of the Hospital. The project was a big success and the
Hospital continue to use this platform from then without updates.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager
